languages.text: "Вольный Торговец, исполните приговор собственноручно или прикажете свершить правосудие мне?"

traits.locale_text: "{name}, как Лорд-капитан корабля вы имеете право самостоятельно исполнить приговор".

languages.text: "Rogue Trader, will you carry out the sentence yourself, or do you order me to deliver justice?"
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец, исполните приговор собственноручно или прикажете свершить правосудие мне?"

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader, will you carry out the sentence yourself, or do you order me to deliver justice?"
"Rogue Trader, will you carry out the sentence yourself, or do you order me to deliver justice?"
"Rogue Trader, will you carry out the sentence yourself, or do you order me to deliver justice?"
"Rogue Trader, will you carry out the sentence yourself, or do you order me to deliver justice?"
"Rogue Trader, will you carry out the sentence yourself, or do you order me to deliver justice?"

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダー、ご自身で判決を執行しますか？それとも、私に正義を執行するようお命じになりますか？」
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, will you carry out the sentence yourself, or do you order me to deliver justice?"

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダー、ご自身で判決を執行しますか？それとも、私に正義を執行するようお命じになりますか？」

languages.text: "Hür Tacir, cezayı kendiniz mi uygulamak istersiniz yoksa gerekeni benim yapmamı mı emredeceksiniz?"
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, will you carry out the sentence yourself, or do you order me to deliver justice?"

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir, cezayı kendiniz mi uygulamak istersiniz yoksa adaleti benim teslim etmemi mi emrediyorsunuz?"

languages.text: «Comerciante Independiente, ¿será usted quien ejecute la sentencia o prefiere ordenarme que reparta justicia?».
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, will you carry out the sentence yourself, or do you order me to deliver justice?"

traits.locale_text: «Comerciante Independiente, ¿será usted quien ejecute la sentencia o prefiere ordenarme que reparta justicia?».

languages.text: “行商浪人，你希望亲自执行判决，还是让我来行使正义？”
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, will you carry out the sentence yourself, or do you order me to deliver justice?"

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人，你希望亲自执行判决，还是让我来行使正义？”

languages.text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, souhaitez-vous exécuter la sentence vous-même ou préférez-vous que je m'en charge ? »
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, will you carry out the sentence yourself, or do you order me to deliver justice?"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, souhaitez-vous exécuter la sentence vous-même ou préférez-vous que je m'en charge ? »

languages.text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, vollstreckt Ihr das Urteil selbst oder soll ich der Gerechtigkeit Genüge tun?"
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, will you carry out the sentence yourself, or do you order me to deliver justice?"

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, vollstreckt Ihr das Urteil selbst oder soll ich der Gerechtigkeit Genüge tun?"
